The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 03 September is 2,984 (345.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 30 August, there were 51 new confirmed cases (5.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 August, there were 60 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 15% (9 fewer cases).
